etomica.lattice

Interface SiteFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cell.CellFactory, CellMolecular.CellFactory

    public interface SiteFactory
    Interface for a class that generates the sites populating a lattice.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object makeSite(AbstractLattice lattice, int[] coord)
      Constructs a site for placement in a lattice.

    • Method Detail

      • makeSite

        java.lang.Object makeSite(AbstractLattice lattice,
                          int[] coord)
        Constructs a site for placement in a lattice. Arguments are not necessarily used to construct the site, but are provided by the interface in case this information is to be held or used by the site.
        Parameters:
        lattice - the lattice where the site will reside
        coord - the index by which the site can be accessed from the lattice. New site should make its own copy of this if it uses the coord.
